meaning_str.bing:
v. 提供；供应；给予；规定
网络. 供给；准备；为某人提供某物

供给；准备；为某人提供某物

提供；供应；供给；给予；准备；预备；规定；订立；确保；赋予；配备；指派；任命（担任有俸神职）；使可用；满足需要；预见到；考虑到；为…作准备

1.en: Events provide a way for a class or object to notify other classes or objects when something of interest happens.
1.cn: 在发生其他类或对象关注的事情时，类或对象可通过事件通知它们。

2.en: Sometimes, the results of a rule are so easy to fix that you can provide a simple repair procedure for the user.
2.cn: 有时候，一个规则的结果太容易确定，以至于您可以为用户提供一个简单的修正程序。

3.en: He said he is 'willing to provide every piece of information' but declined to discuss details.
3.cn: 他说，他愿意提供全部信息，但拒绝透露详情。

0.en: Let me ask you this, what do you do for the extra hundred? So would I have to provide the grapes?
0.cn: 我问你，你多收一百块，可以额外提供什么服务？那我要提供葡萄吗？

1.en: To provide the energy needed to power China's growth means supply the nation's power plants with vast quantities of fossil fuels.
1.cn: 为中华崛起提供所需的能量，意味着给这个国家的发电站提供大量的化石燃料。

2.en: But the warping of space-time may also provide shortcuts that could make interstellar travel a snap.
2.cn: 但时空的弯曲也许也提供了可以使星际旅行瞬间实现的捷径。

3.en: And unlike the ups and downs of solar and wind, these cows provide a constant source of electricity.
3.cn: 和太阳能和风能的不稳定不同，这些奶牛能提供稳定的电能。

4.en: My family voted at the Coliseum this morning. Mitch, listen to me. Whatever you need, we will provide.
4.cn: 我的家人今早就在体育场投了票。米切， 听我说，不管你需要什么，我们都会提供。

5.en: Danny, what exactly is happening? In every station we provide hot water, ginger porridge. Ginger porridge! Yeah. Perfect.
5.cn: 丹尼，这到底是什么情况？在每个站点，我们提供热水，姜汤。姜汤。对，很好。

6.en: Even if you rip off the nearest door to provide a bigger area to catch her with, you still wouldn't be able to save her anyway.
6.cn: 就算你就近拆下一扇门来提供一个更大的表面积来接住她，你也还是无法救她一命。

7.en: This is not happening. Be that as it may, page nine says that you have to provide me with lemon-flavored sparkling waters, so chop-chop.
7.cn: 这不是真的。即便是这样，第九页写着你得为我提供柠檬味的气泡水，所以赶紧的…

8.en: I remember one summer when he was 13, he built a small nuclear reactor in the shed and told everybody he was gonna provide free electricity for the whole town.
8.cn: 我记得他13岁时的夏天他在小屋里做了一个小型原子反应堆，然后跟大家说他会为全镇人提供免费电力。

9.en: Ms. Vick, as your counsel was informed, by signing this document, you hereby verify the confession you provide today pertaining to the crimes you're accused of after your arrest one week ago.
9.cn: 维克女士，已经通知了你的律师，来签署这份文件 你在这将确认一周前被逮捕归案后你所提供的有关你被指控的罪行的供诉。

10.cn: 纳威族人相信，爱娃是万物之主。

11.en: You're the one spy I've never been able to provide as someone close to the Autobots.
11.cn: 再也找不到比你更好的能够安排在汽车人身边的间谍了。

12.en: After banishing all music from her life, she found a way to provide for her daughter.
12.cn: 她把所有音乐从她的生活里抹去之后，她找到了一个养活女儿的方法。

13.en: I chose a life of honest labor to provide for myself and the wife who was expecting my child.
13.cn: 我是个忠实的工人，这样才能养活我和我的妻子，以及我未出事的孩子。

14.en: This is a special Chinese vinegar. It's very aromatic and pungent. It's gonna provide the sour.
14.cn: 这是一种特制的中国醋，味道芳香扑鼻，能够调出酸味。

15.en: And the NSA has asked us over and over to provide user information from our social networking sites.
15.cn: 而国安局还一遍又一遍地要求我们，让我们交出自己社交网站上的用户信息。

16.en: I can get the IMF to provide half the bailout. This would counteract the Chinese demands for drilling rights.
16.cn: 我可以让国际货币基金组织拿出一半的救市资金，这可以制衡中国对开采权的要求。

17.en: Most low-wage workers are women. And that extra money would help them pay the bills and provide for their families.
17.cn: 大多数低工资的人是妇女。这些额外的钱将帮助他们付清账单,并供养他们的家人。

18.en: But he would've hated himself even more if he'd lost our farm, if he hadn't been able to provide and support his family.
18.cn: 但如果不能保住我们的农场，他会更痛恨自己，如果他不能养活自己的家人。

19.en: This made possible by IMF agents who did willing provide the launch codes to a known terrorist. Do I have that right, agent Brandt?
19.cn: 而这一切的起因，都是因为碟中谍小组的特工故意将导弹发射密码透漏给一个恐怖分子，我说对了吗，勃兰特特工？
